name: Ancients of Ooga
description: From the creators of 'Cloning Clyde' comes a new epic puzzle solving adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or laterProcessor: 3.0 Ghz or higher. Memory: 512MBHard Disk Space: 500 MBVideo Card: Shader version 3.0 or higher compatible cardDirectX®: 9.0

reviews.review_text: I like it. It's a fun game to play if you're bored or just looking for some fun. Personally, I found it entertaining.
